title: Overview
description: Provides a high-level introduction to AIGNE WebSmith, explaining what it does, its key features, and how it helps users automatically create professional websites.

title: Getting Started
description: Guides new users through the essential first steps, from installation to generating and viewing their first website in under 30 minutes.

title: Installation
description: Provides step-by-step instructions on how to install the AIGNE CLI, which is required to use WebSmith.

title: Preparing Your Content
description: Explains what kind of content and information you should have ready to help the AI generate the best possible website for your needs.

title: Your First Website
description: A quick, hands-on tutorial that walks you through creating a simple configuration file and using a single command to generate a complete website.

title: Core Tasks
description: Explains how to perform common day-to-day operations with WebSmith, such as publishing your site, updating content, and managing translations.

title: Generating a Website
description: Details the 'generate' command and explains how to define your website requirements in the configuration file for the AI to build.

title: Publishing Your Website
description: Learn about the different options available for publishing your website, from the free WebSmith Cloud to your own custom domain.

title: Publish to WebSmith Cloud
description: Learn how to publish your website to the free WebSmith Cloud hosting.

title: Publish to your own website
description: Learn how to publish your website to your own existing website infrastructure.

title: Publish to a new dedicated website
description: Learn how to create and publish to a new dedicated website with custom domain and hosting.

title: Updating Website Content
description: Learn how to use the 'update' command to make changes or provide feedback to refine the content on your existing pages.

title: Updating Website Structure
description: Learn how to modify the overall structure of your website, such as adding, removing, or reorganizing pages.

title: Updating Page Content
description: Learn how to refine the content and details within an individual webpage.

title: Translating Your Content
description: Explains how to use the 'translate' command to automatically create different language versions of your website pages.

title: Managing Themes
description: Covers how to use the 'theme' command to generate and apply different visual styles and color schemes to your website.

title: Using the Interactive Chat
description: Learn how to use the 'chat' command to interactively build and modify your website in a conversational way.

title: Managing Preferences
description: Explains how to use the 'prefs' command to view, manage, and clear saved user preferences to customize WebSmith's behavior.

title: Viewing Update History
description: Learn how to use the 'history' command to review a log of all previous updates made to your website content and structure.

title: Clearing Workspace and Data
description: Shows you how to use the 'clear' command to safely remove generated files, workspace data, or the entire configuration.

title: Advanced Features
description: Explore advanced capabilities of AIGNE WebSmith to further customize and enhance your website, including component management and using specialized visual elements.

title: Managing Components
description: Explains how to use the 'component' command to pull and update the component library used to build your website's visual elements.

title: Using Special Components
description: Learn how to leverage powerful, pre-built components like the Terminal Player and FullBackground Hero to create visually engaging and interactive web pages.

title: Terminal Player
description: Provides instructions on how to embed and use the Terminal Player component to display terminal recordings and command-line interactions on your website.

title: Reference
description: Provides detailed reference material, including a complete list of commands, version history, and licensing information.

title: Command Line Reference
description: A comprehensive guide to all available commands and their parameters, for users who want to explore advanced capabilities.

title: Changelog
description: Lists all the updates, bug fixes, and new features that have been added to AIGNE WebSmith over time.
